Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ Structure

enum class xdsp::filter::Biquad::Structure
strong

Biquad filter structure used in processing.

Enumerator
DIRECT 

\( y[n] = a_0\cdot x[n] + a_1\cdot x[n-1] + a_2\cdot x[n-2] - b_1\cdot y[n-1] - b_2\cdot y[n-2] \)

Definition at line 44 of file Biquad.cpp.

45 {
46 if (structure == Structure::DIRECT)
47 {
48 // y[n] = a0*x[n] + a1*x[n-1] + a2*x[n-2] - b1*y[n-1] - b2*y[n-2]
49 double y = coefficients[A0] * x +
50 coefficients[A1] * state_registers[X_Z1] +
51 coefficients[A2] * state_registers[X_Z2] -
52 coefficients[B1] * state_registers[Y_Z1] -
53 coefficients[B2] * state_registers[Y_Z2];
54
55 util::fix_underflow(y);
56
57 // Update state registers
58 state_registers[X_Z2] = state_registers[X_Z1];
59 state_registers[X_Z1] = x;
60 state_registers[Y_Z2] = state_registers[Y_Z1];
61 state_registers[Y_Z1] = y;
62
63 return y;
64 }
65 else if (structure == Structure::CANONICAL)
66 {
67 // w[n] = x[n] - b1*x[n-1] - b2*x[n-2]
68 double w = x - coefficients[B1] * state_registers[X_Z1] - coefficients[B2] * state_registers[X_Z2];
69
70 // y[n] = a0*w[n] + a1*x[n-1] + a2*x[n-2];
71 double y = coefficients[A0] * w + coefficients[A1] * state_registers[X_Z1] + coefficients[A2] * state_registers[X_Z2];
72
73 util::fix_underflow(y);
74
75 // Update state registers
76 state_registers[X_Z2] = state_registers[X_Z1];
77 state_registers[X_Z1] = w;
78
79 return y;
80 }
81 else if (structure == Structure::TRANSPOSED_DIRECT)
82 {
83 // w[n] = x[n] + y[n-1]
84 double w = x + state_registers[Y_Z1];
85
86 // y[n] = a0*w[n] + x[n-1]
87 double y = coefficients[A0] * w + state_registers[X_Z1];
88
89 util::fix_underflow(y);
90
91 // Update state registers
92 state_registers[Y_Z1] = state_registers[Y_Z2] - coefficients[B1] * w;
93 state_registers[Y_Z2] = -coefficients[B2] * w;
94 state_registers[X_Z1] = state_registers[X_Z2] + coefficients[A1] * w;
95 state_registers[X_Z2] = coefficients[A2] * w;
96
97 return y;
98 }
99 else if (structure == Structure::TRANSPOSED_CANONICAL)
100 {
101 // y[n] = a0*x[n] + x[n-1]
102 double y = coefficients[A0] * x + state_registers[X_Z1];
103
104 util::fix_underflow(y);
105
106 // Update state registers
107 state_registers[X_Z1] = coefficients[A1] * x - coefficients[B1] * y + state_registers[X_Z2];
108 state_registers[X_Z2] = coefficients[A2] * x - coefficients[B2] * y;
109
110 return y;
111 }
112
113 return x; // Unknown structure -> pass-through!
114 }
